title: Ready, Steady, Transform! â€“ Key takeaways from the forum
content:
Do you remember our event Ready, Steady, Transform!, which took place on 20â€“21 November in Paris?
Weâ€™re excited to look back on it through a new accessible document summarising key insights, sources, and links shared by our speakers and participants during the event.

This first MCA Forum aimed to create a space for exchange, shared learning, and the development of new initiatives. Participants were invited to critically reassess digital cultural practices and share experiences, tools, and visions across key thematic areas: sustainability, inclusion, preservation, digital innovation, and policies.
Centred on two guiding questions â€” how digital cultural heritage can act as a catalyst for more sustainable and inclusive societies, and how effective cross-sector collabo
creator: violatrombetta
sourceDescription: EUROPEAN TRANS-DOMAIN NETWORK FOR DIGITAL CULTURAL HERITAGE AND RELATED COMMUNITIES

title: 3 opportunities from the Balkan Museum Network!
content:
We are happy to share three great opportunities from the Balkan Museum Network for cultural heritage professionals, researchers, and practitioners.

 

1 â€“ Call for Webinar Contributors

Cultural heritage faces growing challenges, but inspiring initiatives are already making a difference. Heritage professionals, organizations, and community initiatives are invited to share proven practices that protect heritage, build capacity, and engage communities. Selected contributors will present their work in the upcoming webinar series and exchange knowledge with peers across the sector.
Deadline to apply: 10 MarchðŸª„ â€“> Apply
